description: With WarnerMedia preparing to launch its new streaming service HBO Max, the company is adding a streaming TV pioneer as CEO: Jason Kilar, the founding CEO of Hulu.
title: WarnerMedia names Hulu's founding CEO as new chief
title_page: WarnerMedia names Hulu's founding CEO as new chief - CNN
maintext:
(CNN Business) With WarnerMedia preparing to launch its new streaming service HBO Max, the company is adding a streaming TV pioneer as CEO: Jason Kilar, the founding CEO of Hulu.
CNN is a division of WarnerMedia, along with HBO, Warner Bros, TNT, TBS, and other media assets. Kilar will join the company on May 1.
AT&T T Kilar will report to John Stankey, WarnerMedia's current CEO, who was promoted last year to be president and chief operating officer of WarnerMedia's parent company
Since then, Stankey and the company have been searching for a new CEO. Kilar was reported to be in contention for the job last month.
WarnerMedia has named Jason Kilar as its new CEO.
Netflix NFLX Kilar's appointment reflects the fact that HBO Max is WarnerMedia's biggest corporate priority this year. HBO Max is the company's answer to Disney+ and other options in the streaming marketplace. It is set to launch in May.
